name: Verify Manager cannot remove Admin from organization
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.
- Signup `third user`.
- Invite `third user` to organization with `Admin` role via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` **cannot** remove another `Admin` from organization.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.
  • Signup third user.
  • Invite third user to organization with Admin role via API.

Verify that:

  • Manager cannot remove another Admin from organization.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: <<User2>> :: Verify that user is not displayed in users list
Message: User regression-j8nfyqsdyr@apolo.us should not be displayed in organization users list!

             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

E   AssertionError: User regression-j8nfyqsdyr@apolo.us should not be displayed in organization users list!
